entries.meaning: A gemstone having bands of red sard; a variety of onyx or chalcedony.
examples: The fifth, sardonyx; the sixth, sardius; the seventh, chrysolyte; the eighth, beryl; the ninth, a topaz; the tenth, a chrysoprasus; the eleventh, a jacinth; the twelfth, an amethyst.

entries.meaning: (heraldry) A tincture of sanguine colour when the blazoning is done by precious stones.
